welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sileby, a charming town known for its beautiful countryside and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our enchanting city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport handles all commercial flights and provides necessary amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport is used for military operations and is not accessible to the public.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport terminal.
